title: FPGA Wavetable Synthesizer
description: Real-time polyphonic wavetable synth on a Xilinx FPGA with USB MIDI and 48kHz audio pipeline.

title: Minimal RISC-V Core
description: A compact RV32I 3-stage pipeline with hazard forwarding and Wishbone bus.

title: Software-Defined Radio Receiver
description: OFDM demodulation chain with frequency/phase correction and soft decoding in C++/CUDA.

title: Embedded RTOS Sensor Hub
description: Bare-metal ARM Cortex-M RTOS with drivers, fixed-point filters, and BLE telemetry.

title: Robotics SLAM Module
description: EKF-based visual-inertial SLAM prototype with loop closure and map optimization.

title: Synchronous Buck Converter
description: Power stage design with current-mode control and digital compensation.
